channel.title: HIDden files
channel.description: Hello everyone how do i hide my client files so that no one can change ip? please im new just help me plox

item.title: HIDden files
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

You must enable the option to allow viewing of hidden files on your computer.
Tools > Folder Options… > View(Tab) > Show hiddel files and folders

Select all the hidden files you want to unhide, right click, and select properties.
Uncheck the box that says hidden.

Read full topic

item.title: HIDden files
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

His solution will work.
However, it is not difficult to view hidden files, and most programmers have enabled the option to see hidden files.
The best way to prevent them from chaning anything is to not include the source files (.java files) in the client download.

Read full topic
